body_content.explanation: a description, sometimes read out in court as part of a trial, of the harmful effects a crime has had on the victim (= the person who has suffered because of it) or on someone close to them:
examples: She believes that victim statements influence judges and lead to harsher sentences.
Mr Powell will be given his chance to make a victim's statement in court.
She read out the victim impact statement that she had delivered to the court when her son's murderers had been sentenced.
